Room.Name: The dark woods
Room.Description: You are travelling through woods that are as dark as night. The trees above block all light and wind. The air is stagnant and smells of death and decay. The lack of sounds and other signs of life make your skin crawl and you feel very much like turning back and heading for safer areas. The path leads north into more open lands while it also leads south into the darkness of the forest. A small sign is posted here.

ExtraDescription.Description: []================================[] | BEWARE! | Hope you | | Travellers are | enjoy it! | | advised to stay | <-------> | | in groups for | Skurge | | safety. | Ragnarok | []================================[]

Room.Name: The dark woods
Room.Description: You wearily travel through the darkness of the forest. Huge skeletal trees line the edges of the path and tower above you. Errant rays of light spear down through the gaps in the canopy above and provide small spots of light that seem to attract what little foliage can grow on the dark forest floor. The path winds north and south into darkness.

Room.Name: The small intersection in the forest
Room.Description: The forest path splits here in three directions. Small paths lead to the east, north, and south. The trees above leave a gap which allows light to fill the intersection. It is almost as though you are in a circle of light that provides sanctuary in this land of darkness. Something has been scrawled in the dirt in blood here.

ExtraDescription.Description: BeWAre tHe SwAmP oGreS......

Room.Name: The edge of the forest and hills
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a dark forest. A path leads north into the forest and its deadly darkness and silence. Looking west, you see a path that leads up into a foothills region. Standing here on the boundary between light and darkness, you feel very vulnerable and alone.

Room.Name: In the dense forest
Room.Description: You walk along a small path leading through a dark forest. No sounds can be heard and little light penetrates the canopy of trees above you. The air here smells musty and you long for a fresh breath. You see an intersection of paths to the west. The path you are on leads south into the darkening woods.

Room.Name: The dark forest path
Room.Description: You continue on through darkness and gloom. The path below you has become a wet quagmire. It is difficult to walk, and you make squishing sounds as you move on. Looking east, you see a swampy path. The main path leads north and south into darkness.

Room.Name: A turn in the path
Room.Description: The forest path turns here towards the north and west. To the north, you see that the ground has become dank and swampy, while the western path appears to be entering a hilly area. You hear sounds of swamp creatures to the north east.

Room.Name: The bloody intersection
Room.Description: This is a small intersection. Paths lead east, west, and south. You are struck by the carnage here when you enter the clearing. There appears to have been a great battle here. Blood is everywhere and the ground is all torn up. Pieces of beaten armour and broken blades lie all around. Examining the tracks here lead you to believe that the dead and wounded were dragged off in two directions, south and east.

Room.Name: The rocky path
Room.Description: The path here winds among the low rocky hills. The long trek up and down the hills begins to tire you greatly. Looking east, you see a small clearing. More hills are to the north of here.

Room.Name: The rocky path
Room.Description: The path here is very rocky and treacherous. The travelling is rough and you slip and fall often. Looking south, you see that the path continues into the hills. Smoother ground is to the east, but the path seems to lead into a dark forest in that direction.

Room.Name: Up the rocky hillside
Room.Description: You are climbing on a rocky hillside. As you scramble about, loose rocks and small boulders bounce and fall down below you. Looking to the east and west, you see more stable ground. The hillside itself goes on higher to the south and it drops away to the north.

Room.Name: The sparse foothills
Room.Description: You are in foothills that are sparsely covered by scraggly bushes and weather beaten trees. There are little signs of life here. Only bare rock and dry dirt can be seen. Looking east, you see a small pass that will allow you to leave the foothills. The foothills themselves extend to the south.

Room.Name: Standing on level ground
Room.Description: You are standing at the edge of a steep set of foothills. Looking down, you see what appears to be a marshy, dark forest. It reeks of death and decay. Even here, you catch its scent on the winds. From here, you can travel south deeper into the foothills or to the west where a small pass will allow you to climb down.

Room.Name: In the foothills
Room.Description: You are in a barren set of foothills. Looking around, all you see are dead plants and boulders. From the south, you get a whiff of salty air. Barren paths lead east, north, and south into more barren hills.

Room.Name: Before the huge tree
Room.Description: You enter a large ring of boulders. Sheltered by this wall of stones, a small cluster of plants have sprung up. In the center of this group of trees and bushes is a huge gnarled tree. It appears to have been twisted and torn by the forces of nature. It sways and moans as a strong wind from the south tears through its old feeble branches. The hills themselves lead in all directions.

Room.Name: Before the dark cave
Room.Description: You stand directly before a huge dark cave. The rocks and boulders outside the cave are covered with blood stains and all types of broken and shattered bones lie around. An unbearable stench comes from within the cave itself. The dark cave entrance looms to the east. The hills themselves lead towards the north, south, and west.

Room.Name: Inside the horrid cave
Room.Description: The stench is overwhelming. You can hardly breathe as you enter the cave. Looking around, you realize that some bizarre and horrible creature uses this cave as a home. Skeletal remains lie all over. Several half-eaten corpses are rotting away slowly in the gloomy darkness. In the back of the cave, you see a large pile of rotting cloth, fur, and plant matter. Light and safety is towards the west.

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to be some sort of nest......

Room.Name: The hills overlooking the shore
Room.Description: Standing at the edge of the foothills, you are able to look down upon a rocky shoreline. It appears as though a vast ocean is to the south. Sea birds have made their nests here in the rocks and you are heartened by the presence of life here. It is possible to climb down to the shore here. The hills themselves are to the north. The edge of the hills leads to the east along the shoreline.

Room.Name: The hills overlooking the shoreline
Room.Description: You stand on a barren section of hills that overlook a rocky shoreline. The stiff ocean wind has blown the rocks smooth here and you have to lean forward a bit to keep your balance. The salty sea air fills your nostrils and you notice signs of life in the rocky crags here. You can climb down towards the shore or head north into the hills themselves. The rocky summit you are standing leads east and west along the shoreline.

Room.Name: The hills above the shoreline
Room.Description: You stand on a rocky summit overlooking a rough shoreline below. The sea wind blows hard across the rocks here and they have been worn smooth with time. Looking around, you notice that you can safely climb down towards the shore. The hills themselves stretch towards the north. The rough summit you stand upon leads west along the shoreline.

Room.Name: The rocky shore
Room.Description: You are at the base of the rocky hills. Stretching to the south and east, you see a rocky shore. To the southeast, you see a small altar of some sorts that glows with an eerie blue light. It is possible to climb up into the hills here.

Room.Name: The rocky shoreline
Room.Description: You are on a rocky shore that borders a vast sea. A stiff wind blows here and whistles among the rocks. You see an altar of some sort built on the shore to the south. The shore itself leads east and west. Looking up, you see foothills and rocky crags.

Room.Name: The rocky shore
Room.Description: You stand at the base of some rocky hills, where they meet a rocky shore. A vast sea is to your south. Looking to the southwest, you see a small altar that glows with a eerie blue light. The shore stretches out to the south and west. It is possible to climb up into the hills here.

Room.Name: The edge of the sea
Room.Description: You walk along the water's edge. The vastness of the ocean is staggering as you look out across it. You notice a small altar that glows with blue light to the east. The shore itself extends north away from the water's edge.

Room.Name: The Blood Sea Portal
Room.Description: You stand on a small pedestal like altar that has been built on the shore here. Standing here, you can look out across the sea. You can almost imagine that you see a far away island. Dominating the altar is a small blue portal of light. It is possible to walk south into the portal. The shore itself extends to the north, east, and west. There are small inscriptions on the rock at the base of the portal.

ExtraDescription.Description: "Enter all ye who wish to join the Brotherhood!"
You see a swirling blue portal of light. You think you can see glimpses of something moving on the "other side".

Room.Name: The edge of the sea
Room.Description: You walk along the water's edge. The tide appears to have risen. Very little debris is washed up on shore. You slip and slide as you tread across the slippery rocks that make up the shore. To the west you see a small altar that radiates blue light. The shore extends north away from the water's edge.

Room.Name: Floating in blue light
Room.Description: You seem to be floating in blue weightlessness. You tumble head over heels and finally right yourself. Gaining your bearings, you notice that there are two "windows" in the sea of blue here. One to the south shows an image of a snowy plain. Another window the the north shows an image of a rocky shore.

Room.Name: The swampy path
Room.Description: This damp path seems to lead into a deep, dark swamp. The trees above block out all light and stifle the wind. You smell swamp gas and hear damp squashing sounds all around you. The path leads east deeper into the swamp. You also see a dark forest to the west.

Room.Name: The swampy path
Room.Description: You tread lightly in a wet, swampy path. All around you, you see pools of quicksand and rotting vegetation. Unlike the forest to the west, the swamp is teeming with life. Some of it is harmless, some is not. The path leads east and west into more swamp.

Room.Name: The swampy path
Room.Description: You weave your way through the treacherous swamp. Gas rises all around you and a damp mist covers the ground, making it impossible to travel safely, without carefully picking your way around obstacles. Large, gnarled trees rise above you. Their moss covered branches block out all traces of the sun. The path here leads east and west.

Room.Name: The turn in the swampy path
Room.Description: You come upon a bend in the swampy path. The ground here is fairly sturdy, as this place is elevated above the rest of the swamp. Looking around, you see a dark, mist filled swamp. Small paths lead south and west into the mist.

Room.Name: The swampy path
Room.Description: You tread lightly through the mirky water and sludge that makes up the path you follow. To the east, there is a thick wall of mist. You can see nothing within it. Harder ground rises to the north.

Room.Name: Lost in the Mist
Room.Description: You wander, hopelessly lost. Swirling mist obscures your vision and clouds your mind. You lose all concept of direction. Small, silent giggles can be heard all around. You can wander in any direction.

Room.Name: Lost in the Mist
Room.Description: You are in a thick misty area. The mist swirls around you, seeming to taunt you and dare you to escape. You feel a slight electric charge in the mist. It almost caresses your body as it floats about you. You can wander in any direction.......

Room.Name: Lost in the Mist
Room.Description: You try to peer through the mist......You see nothing. It swirls about you, covering you in a damp sheen. There is no sound, all light is eagerly devoured by the mist. You feel totally and hopelessly lost.

Room.Name: Lost in the Mist
Room.Description: You stumble through the marsh here. The swamp seems to have swallowed you up and denied you exit. This mist is your jailor. You cannot tell where you are. You hear quiet laughter all about you.

Room.Name: Lost in the Mist
Room.Description: You wander, lost, for what seems an eternity. Then....From nowhere....You see what appears to be trees and hills to the east. The mist itself thickens to the west, while it grows thin to the east.

Room.Name: Lost in the Mist
Room.Description: You wander through the thick mist. It swirls all about you and makes it hard to breathe. The ground below you makes a soft squishing sound as you trudge on, but this noise is absorbed by the mist and does not travel. You can wander in any direction.

Room.Name: Lost in the Mist
Room.Description: You wander, lost hopelessly. The mist swirls all about you. You can discern no direction. You stumble blindly through the mist, oblivious to your surroundings.

Room.Name: The solid path
Room.Description: A solid path rises out of the misty swamp. It leads north, into what appears to be a forested area. The trees, above, allow light and air to penetrate and you can see the sky above. A thick bank of mist is to your west.

Room.Name: A forested path
Room.Description: The path here leads north through a thick forest. High bushes and forest undergrowth line both sides of the trail. Looking north, you see a thin line of smoke rising up above the tree line. You also notice a crude wooden gate farther north on the trail. The trail itself leads south into murky territory.

Room.Name: The gate before the Ogre Village
Room.Description: You stand before a huge pair of crude, wooden gates. They are thrown open. Looking inside the gates, you see a crude village. Large humanoid creatures are milling to and fro.......Ogres! You can head north through the gate or south into the forest.

Room.Name: Among the crude huts
Room.Description: You walk among the huts of the ogre village. The village appears to be cut from the heart of the forest itself. The swamp, nearby, provides the ogres with a prime hunting ground. Small paths lead north and east.

Room.Name: Inside the gates
Room.Description: You stand just north of the gates to the village. Looking around, you see many crude huts and cooking fires. To the north, you see a huge fire pit. Behind it, there appears to be a hut of sorts. Small paths lead east and west among the crude huts. The gates to the south provide an exit from the village.

Room.Name: Among the crude huts
Room.Description: You walk through the crude village. Small huts made of wood and thatch surround you. Every so often, you can hear grunts and snarls inside the huts. The smell here is unbearable. You wonder what type of creature could possibly live in such squalor. Small paths lead west and north here.

Room.Name: The gathering place
Room.Description: This appears to be the clearing the ogres use to assemble. It is quite large and has a raised mound in the center that contains a crude throne. The ground in front of the throne is quite worn, as if it is sat on quite often. You get the impression that this place is a crude sort of auditorium. Small paths lead east and south.

Room.Name: The firepit before the lodge
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a huge firepit. The heat from the burning embers makes you sweat as you stand here. Large spits above the pit are empty but they appear to be quite large enough to hold hapless adventurers. A large lodge is towards the north, while paths lead east, west, and south into the village itself.

Room.Name: The village dump
Room.Description: The smell here overpowers you. All around you are the rotting remains of the village's refuse. Partially eaten corpses, rotting food, and other truly disgusting things have been discarded here. Paths lead south and west towards fresher air.

Room.Name: The entryway to the lodge
Room.Description: You are at the entry hall to a large lodge. Animal pelts and other trophies line the walls here. Large chests on either side of the door appear to be locked. The lodge stretches north, while the doors to the south provide an exit into the village.

Room.Name: The throne room
Room.Description: You stand in a large, crudely decorated throne room. A huge throne adorned with humanoid skulls sits against the west wall. A crude, blood stained altar is against the east wall. A doorway is directly to the north, long strands of beads blocking the view of the other side. Crude torches light the hall and smoke clings to the ceiling.

Room.Name: The chieftain's room
Room.Description: This appears to be the ogre chieftain's private quarters. A huge pile of furs is in the far corner. Large chests fill the room. All of them have heavy pad locks. The room is filled with trophies of dead enemies. It is quite lavishly decorated for such a crude inhabitant as an ogre. A beaded doorway is to the south.

Room.Name: The frigid wastelands
Room.Description: You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you. The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make impossible for you to discern any directions.

Room.Name: The frigid wastelands
Room.Description: You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you. The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible to discern any directions.

Room.Name: The Glacier Temple
Room.Description: You are in a small temple. It appears to be built entirely from ice. The ice walls are frosted and are opaque. There is a small blue portal here. You can go north, to enter the portal. Looking south, you see a world of white outside the open doorway. Swirling snow and bright light obscure your view.

Room.Name: The frigid wastelands
Room.Description: You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you. The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you to discern any directions.

Room.Name: The frigid wastelands
Room.Description: You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you. The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you to discern any directions.

Room.Name: The frigid wastelands
Room.Description: You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you. The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you to discern any directions.

Room.Name: The frigid wastelands
Room.Description: You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you. The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you to discern any directions.

Room.Name: The frigid wastelands
Room.Description: You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you. The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you to discern any direction.

Room.Name: The frigid wastelands
Room.Description: You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you. The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you to discern any directions.

Room.Name: The edge of the frigid wastes
Room.Description: You stand at the base of a steep rocky cliff. To the north, a vast arctic wasteland stretches out. The snow falls lightly here and the wind is not very fierce. You can climb up the rocky cliff or head north into the arctic wastes.

Room.Name: On the cliffside
Room.Description: You cling to the side of the cliff. Looking down, you are terrified by the sheer distance to the ground below. You can climb up higher into the cliffs, but the area above is obscured by clouds and you cannot tell what lies waiting above.

Room.Name: Before the gates of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You stand at the edge of a high cliff. Directly south, set back off the cliff's edge, you see a huge pair of gates. These gates appear to be carved almost completely out of ice. A huge city and keep appear to be on the other side of these gates. There is also a possibility of climbing down the cliff face.

ExtraDescription.Description: The gates to the city are made almost completely of ice. Looking closely, you can see intricate carvings in the gates. They appear to be of creatures that are half man and half bull.

Room.Name: The city streets of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You walk among the ice and snow covered shops and homes. Most of the doors are closed and only the light from the windows betrays the presence of inhabitants. A cold wind blows through here, scattering fine clouds of snow all about. Small streets lead south and east.

Room.Name: Inside the gates of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You stand just inside the gates to the city of Mahn-Tor. The city itself spreads out in front of you. The buildings are sturdy, as they appear to be made from the very rock of this mountain. Snow falls all around and a fine sheet of ice can be seen covering all but the most used walk ways. Small city streets lead east and west, while a main road appears to lead south.

Room.Name: The city streets of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You trudge among the icy streets of Mahn-Tor. The streets themselves are made of cobblestone and are quite treacherous. Small homes and businesses along the street are closed tight and light from their windows throws eerie shadows across the dark street. Small streets lead west and south here.

Room.Name: The city streets of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You trudge through the snow covered streets. The street itself is made of cobblestones and the footing is quite treacherous. To the south, you see what appears to be a small tavern. Bright lights shine through the windows. Small streets also lead north and east. A small sign hangs outside the tavern.

Room.Name: The Square of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: This appears to be the main square of Mahn-Tor. A huge fountain graces the center of the square, but the extreme cold has turned it into an ice sculpture. The water has frozen in arcs through the air. Snow and ice covers the square and small streets lead east and west. To the north, you see the gates to the city. You also notice a small store to the south. A small sign hangs outside the store.

Room.Name: The streets of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You walk among the small stores and homes of Mahn-Tor. The cobblestone streets are covered with ice and snow. Small snow drifts have formed at the edges of the streets. The wind blows fiercely. Small streets lead in all directions. There appears to be a large building to the east, but the snow obscures your view.

Room.Name: The Inn of the Broken Horn
Room.Description: You enter a warm tavern. The room is lit mainly by two huge fireplaces at each end of the room. Small tables and a large bar furnish the room. The inhabitants of the inn are all minotaurs of varying size and disposition. Most seem to regard you with suspicion. Few approach you. A large door leads north, out of the bar and back out into the cold.

Room.Name: The Mahn-Tor Equipment Shop
Room.Description: You are in a crude equipment shop. The store is filled with racks of various items that adventurers could use. Large fireplaces light and heat the room. A large desk occupies the back of the room. The door to the shop lies to the north.

Room.Name: The Mahn-Tor General Store
Room.Description: You enter a small store that is dark and cold. Old empty shelves line the walls and snow blows across the dirty stone floor. It is evident that this store was once used, but it is no more. A small doorway leads north out into the chilling snow and wind.

Room.Name: Gorak's Training Room
Room.Description: This room is full of all sorts of weapons and armours. Pieces of old targets and practice dummies lie all around. The walls are chipped and scored from weapon blows. This is obviously the room of an avid warrior. A red door leads east.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

Room.Name: Darkoth's Dark Study
Room.Description: This room is dark. It reeks of death and evil. Arcane symbols and a small altar fill the room. Blood runs from the altar. It is evident that this room is used for unholy purposes. A black door leads east.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

Room.Name: Tyrgoth's Inner Sanctum
Room.Description: Idols to the gods of good fill the room. White furniture and decorations give the room a holy appearance. It is evident that some being of supreme goodness lives here. A white door leads east.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like it leads out to the hall.

Room.Name: The road to the Keep of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You walk up a steep rocky road. It leads up a steep grade to the east. At the end of this steep road, you see a huge keep. Snow swirls all about you and you feel your breath freeze as it leaves your lungs. Blurry lights to the east and west are all you can see from here.

Room.Name: A small guard house
Room.Description: You enter a small guard house. A huge fireplace lights and warms the room. Looking around, you see that the room is fairly well furnished. Thick rugs and curtains help insulate the room and the beds themselves look quite warm. A table in the center of the room has the remnants of a card game strewn across it. A small door leads south.

Room.Name: Before the Keep of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You stand before a huge keep that has been carved into the side of the mountain. Huge wooden gates before you provide entrance to the keep. It appears as though the cold here has convinced the guards to seek warmth inside. You see the lights of the city to the west. You also notice small guard houses to the north and south.

Room.Name: A small guard house
Room.Description: You enter a small, but warm, guard house. Deep rugs and thick curtains insulate the room. A huge fireplace lights and warms the room. Outside, you hear the roar of the freezing wind. A small door leads north out into the cold.

Room.Name: The entryway to the Keep of Mahn-Tor
Room.Description: You are at the entry hall to the huge keep. The high vaulted ceiling is carved from solid stone. Huge stone pillars rise up from the floor to meet the ceiling far above. The architecture appears to be dwarven. A huge pair of gates stand to the west, protecting the keep from the harsh cold outside. A large hall leads east, deeper into the keep.

Room.Name: The Hall
Room.Description: You are in a huge hall. Large tapestries line the walls and huge statues of various make and appearance are spread about. The ceiling above supports huge candelabras, which light the room. To the east, you see a bright light and hear sounds of inhabitation. Looking west, you see the entry gates to the keep.

Room.Name: The Grand Hall
Room.Description: You are in the main hall of the Keep of Mahn-Tor. This hall is huge. The wide floor of the hall is an expanse of marble. It shimmers in the light thrown off by the torches that line the walls. To the east, you see what appears to be a huge golden throne. The hall itself stretches south and a smaller hall leads to the west.

Room.Name: The Great Hall
Room.Description: You stand in the great hall of the keep. Huge pillars rise up to the vaulted ceiling and torch light glimmers off the marble floor here. You are amazed at the sheer size of the hall. The hall itself leads north and east. You notice a smaller hall leading south, deeper into the keep.

Room.Name: Standing before the throne
Room.Description: You stand before the throne of Mahn-Tor. This golden throne is so huge that it takes up almost the entire wall, stretching far above the floor. Sitting upon it, you feel small and feeble. It is evident that this throne is more of a decoration than anything else. Only the largest of kings could sit upon it. The hall leads south and west into other parts of the keep.

ExtraDescription.Description: The golden throne is huge. It takes up the whole wall.........

Room.Name: The Great Hall
Room.Description: You are in a great hall. Huge torches light the room and their light shimmers off the marble floor below you. To the north, you see a huge golden throne. Looking up, you grow dizzy at the height to which the vaulted ceiling rises. The hall itself leads north and west.

Room.Name: The secret hallway
Room.Description: You are in a small, torch lit hall. It leads from east to west. A large gold door is to the west. To the east, you see a heavy stone door.

ExtraDescription.Description: Looks like the back of a secret door of sorts.
A very formidable looking door.

Room.Name: Entry to the Royal Chambers
Room.Description: You are at the entrance to the royal chambers of the keep. A plush shag rug covers the stone floor. Large candelabras hang from the ceiling, lighting the room. A huge fireplace warms the room. Beaded doorways lead south and east. A huge stone door stands in the west wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: A huge stone door.......

Room.Name: The Guard Post
Room.Description: The hall here has been built into a guard post of sorts. It appears as though it would be quite easy to defend in times of emergency. Obviously, something important lies beyond. A small hall leads south, while the main hall can be seen to the north.

Room.Name: The guarded hall
Room.Description: You walk down a torch lit hallway. It has been carved out of pure stone. It is very quiet in this hall. You notice rows of colored doors on each wall. To your east, you see a yellow door. To your west, you see a red door. The hall itself leads south and north.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a red door. It has the name "Gorak" written on it.
You see a yellow door. It has the name "Sumaron" written on it.

Room.Name: The guarded hall
Room.Description: You walk down a small, quiet, torch lit hallway. Doors of different colors are in each wall. To your east, you see a maroon door. To your west, you see a black door. The hall itself leads north and south.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a black door. It has the name "Darkoth" inscribed on it.
You see a maroon door here. It has the name "Amyrok" written on it.

Room.Name: Sumaron's Sanctum
Room.Description: You enter a temple of sorts. A small altar is here and relics of many religions lie around. It is evident that this is the room of a studying cleric. A yellow door leads west.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

Room.Name: Amyrok's Arcane Study
Room.Description: This room is full of shelves which hold various spell components. The center of the room is occupied by a huge pentagram. The entire room smells of smoke and incense. The room is obviously used extensively by a practicing mage. A maroon door leads west.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

Room.Name: The guarded hall
Room.Description: You walk down a quiet hall. The stone walls here are wet with moisture. Colored doors can be seen in the walls here. To your east, you see a green door. To your west, you see a white door. The hall itself leads north and south.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a white door here. It has the name "Tyrgoth" inscribed on it.
You see a green door here. It has the name "Nasturn" written on it.

Room.Name: The Harem Room
Room.Description: This appears to be the harem room of the Keep. Huge piles of furs and beds fill the room. The lighting is dim, but the room is very warm. You can hear music playing quietly from somewhere. Beaded doorways lead north and east.

Room.Name: Nasturn's Humble Abode
Room.Description: This room is filled with all types of natural items. Trees and plants have been lovingly cultivated and grown by hand, in large pots. The room is like an indoor garden. A green door leads west.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

Room.Name: The main living room
Room.Description: This room is decorated with sturdy stone furniture that is carved and gilded. Large candles light the room. A thick rug covers the floor. Thick furs and tapestries decorate the walls. Beaded doorways lead south and west.

Room.Name: The Master Bedroom
Room.Description: This appears to be the master bedroom. A huge bed fills the rooms. Piles of furs and other rich furnishings adorn the room. Candles are everywhere and they help a huge fireplace light the room. The lavishness of the room overwhelms you. Beaded doorways lead north and west.

Room.Name: The end of the guarded hall
Room.Description: You are at the end of the hall. Colored doors line the walls to the north. To your west, you see a brown door. To your east, you see a grey door. The hall itself leads north back along the rows of doors.

ExtraDescription.Description: You see a brown door here. It has the name "Belrak" written on it.
You see a grey door here. It has the name "Dorgar" written on it.

Room.Name: Dorgar's Dismal Domicile
Room.Description: This room is dirty and unkempt. Odds and ends of different items lie all over. It is apparent that some type of pack-rat lives here. It appears as though nothing has ever entered this room and ever left again. A grey door leads west.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

Room.Name: Belrak's Green Room
Room.Description: This room is full of green. The furniture and all other items show the color of nature. The room smells of pine and forest odors. From the items here, it appears as though a woodsman of some sorts lives here. A brown door leads east.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks like it leads to the hall.

NPC.name: oldstyle knight ethereal dark
NPC.description: The ethereal knight is clad in shadowy black armor. It appears as though he was involved in the carnage that occurred here. His soul is trapped here, as he waits for release.
NPC.longDescription: A dark ethereal knight hovers over the bloody clearing.

NPC.name: oldstyle treant tree
NPC.description: The old tree looks as though the wind has battered and torn at it for years. Very few leaves remain. Its limbs are crooked and gnarled. It moans as the wind pushes it back and forth.
NPC.longDescription: A huge, gnarled tree stands here, battered by age and nature.

NPC.name: oldstyle dweller cave creature
NPC.description: The cave dweller looks like a mixture of several disgusting monsters. It has a bird's beak, huge white eyes, a furry body, and long clawed hands and feet. It sees you and snarls.
NPC.longDescription: A slimy, gross creature is here munching on a corpse.

NPC.name: oldstyle toad rock
NPC.description: A grey toad. Its about the size of a cow. Small horns grow all over its body.
NPC.longDescription: A rather large rock toad sits here, croaking loudly.

NPC.name: oldstyle weeping willow tree
NPC.description: The weeping willow has long thins branches. These branches seem to droop in anguish and dismay. You hear a faint sound of crying.
NPC.longDescription: A large willow tree stands here, weeping.

NPC.name: oldstyle mist mistling
NPC.description: It looks like a thin wisp of mist that has gained substance and size.
NPC.longDescription: A mistling emerges from the mist surrounding you.

NPC.name: oldstyle swamp wraith
NPC.description: The swamp wraith is made of mist and is in the image of a great warrior. He appears to emerge from the mist. You feel the cold radiating from his form as he nears you.
NPC.longDescription: A swamp wraith emerges from the mist here.

NPC.name: oldstyle ogre villager
NPC.description: You see a pitifully overworked ogre. It is dressed in rags and shuffles along with its head hung low. It sees you and cringes in mortal terror.
NPC.longDescription: The ogre villager is here, going about its chores.

NPC.name: oldstyle warrior ogre
NPC.description: The ogre warrior is dressed in thick fur armor. He looks quite large and formidable.
NPC.longDescription: The ogre warrior stands here, growling fiercely.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle guard ogre
NPC.description: The ogre guard stands here manning his post. It appears as though he would fight to the death before abandoning his post.
NPC.longDescription: The ogre guard is here manning his post faithfully.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle shaman ogre
NPC.description: The ogre shaman is draped in thick fur cloaks and pelts. He has all types of charms and holy symbols draped about him. He looks at you and snarls.
NPC.longDescription: The ogre shaman is here chanting arcane words and waving his arms.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Cleric AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle chief chieftain ogre
NPC.description: This is the biggest ogre you have ever seen. He is heavily equipped and looks quite formidable. He towers high above you and growls menacingly.
NPC.longDescription: The ogre chieftain is here, observing his subjects.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle barbarian
NPC.description: The plains barbarian is clad in heavy furs. He seems used to the chilling cold and icy wastes.
NPC.longDescription: A plains barbarian is here, clad in heavy furs.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle yeti white
NPC.description: The white yeti looks like a huge white snow ape. Its long arms end in long curved talons and its mouth is full of sharp teeth.
NPC.longDescription: The white yeti crouches here snarling.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle worm ice iceworm
NPC.description: The huge worm is almost 50 feet long. Its huge gaping mouth spews ice and snow as it charges directly at you.
NPC.longDescription: A huge ice worm burrows through the ice and snow here. It rears up and attacks!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle citizen minotaur
NPC.description: You see a rather ragged and cold minotaur. It appears to be looking for a warm place to seek refuge from the cold.
NPC.longDescription: A minotaur citizen is here, hurrying through the icy streets.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle guard minotaur
NPC.description: The minotaur is clad in heavy furs. Beneath these furs, you see the gleam of his armor.
NPC.longDescription: A minotaur guard catches you trespassing and attacks!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle warrior minotaur
NPC.description: You see a huge minotaur that is dressed in thick furs and armor. He has black fur and red eyes. He looks quite capable of protecting the city.
NPC.longDescription: A minotaur warrior is here looking for intruders.

NPC.name: oldstyle minotaur gatekeeper
NPC.description: The minotaur stands rigidly before the gates of the keep. It looks quite miserable standing in the driven snow and ice.
NPC.longDescription: A minotaur is here guarding the Keep of Mahn-Tor.

NPC.name: oldstyle minotaur high guard
NPC.description: The high guard is dressed in blue plate armour. He looks quite dangerous and skilled.
NPC.longDescription: The minotaur high guard is here guarding the Keep.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle minotaur royal guard
NPC.description: The royal guard is quite huge. He is dressed in heavy red armor and wields a huge glaive. He looks quite capable of protecting the keep.
NPC.longDescription: The royal minotaur guard considers you an intruder and attacks!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle guard minotaur elite
NPC.description: This minotaur wields a huge morningstar and is clad in heavy crimson plate and furs.
NPC.longDescription: The elite minotaur guard sees you and attacks!
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Aggressive StayArea AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle girl haremgirl harem slave
NPC.description: She looks quite attractive. Her low cut gown reveals why she was chosen to be in the harem.
NPC.longDescription: A harem girl cowers here in fear.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle butler minotaur
NPC.description: He looks quite regal and refined to be a minotaur.
NPC.longDescription: A minotaur butler stands here rigidly, awaiting orders.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Wimpy AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle keeper minotaur ring-keeper
NPC.description: The ring-keeper is a huge minotaur. You notice a huge ring of multicolored keys hanging from his belt. He wears huge, spiked brass knuckles.
NPC.longDescription: The minotaur ring-keeper stands guarding his post.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger StayArea Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle gorak minotaur warrior master
NPC.description: Gorak is HUGE. His bulging muscles are confined beneath heavy armor. He is the master of the warrior guild of Mahn-Tor.
NPC.longDescription: Gorak, the Minotaur Master Warrior, is here practicing his skills.

NPC.name: oldstyle darkoth minotaur anti-paladin master
NPC.description: Darkoth is a living incarnation of evil. He radiates a dark aura, and a cold chill runs down your spine. He is the master of the Mahn-Tor anti-paladins.
NPC.longDescription: Darkoth, the minotaur anti-paladin, stands here grinning wickedly.

NPC.name: oldstyle tyrgoth minotaur paladin master
NPC.description: Tyrgoth is the minotaur incarnation of good. You feel safe and at ease in his presence. He is the leader of the Mahn-Tor paladins.
NPC.longDescription: Tyrgoth, the minotaur paladin, is here worshipping silently.

NPC.name: oldstyle amyrok minotaur mage master
NPC.description: Amyrok is a small minotaur. He is clad in loose robes and emits an aura of power. He appears quite dangerous, despite his size. He is the leader of the mages of Mahn-Tor.
NPC.longDescription: Amyrok, the minotaur archmage, is here chanting arcane spells.

NPC.name: oldstyle sumaron minotaur cleric master
NPC.description: Sumaron is clad in white glowing robes. He is goodness incarnate. He is the master of all the clerics of Mahn-Tor.
NPC.longDescription: Sumaron, master cleric of Mahn-Tor, is here looking holy.

NPC.name: oldstyle nasturn minotaur druid master
NPC.description: Nasturn is quite a natural looking minotaur. He is dressed in leather and wears no metal of any type. He looks at you and smiles.
NPC.longDescription: Nasturn, the minotaur druid, is here studying the arts of nature.

NPC.name: oldstyle belrak minotaur ranger master
NPC.description: Belrak is clad in green and brown leather. He looks quite agile and thin, when compared to the normal minotaur. He looks at you with a slight smirk.
NPC.longDescription: Belrak, the minotaur ranger, looks unhappy about having visitors.

NPC.name: oldstyle dorgar minotaur thief master
NPC.description: Dorgar is clad all in black. He is tall and slender, unlike most minotaurs. He appears to be quite a skilled thief.
NPC.longDescription: Dorgar, the minotaur thief, is here hiding in the shadows.

NPC.name: oldstyle mahn-tor minotaur grand master
NPC.description: Mahn-Tor towers above you. He is simply huge. Mahn-Tor is clad in the best of armor and robes. He wields the largest axe you have ever seen. You can see why Mahn-Tor is the leader of the minotaurs. He is awe-inspiring.
NPC.longDescription: Mahn-Tor, the minotaur grand master, is here looking down at you.
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis Sanctuary Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

Item.Name: gloves combat
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of minotaur combat gloves
Item.LongDescription: A pair of metal plated gloves lie here.

ExtraDescription.Description: These gloves are plated with metal plates that provide strength and protection.

Item.Name: spiked armor garde
Item.ShortDescription: a suit of spiked garde armor
Item.LongDescription: A pile of spiked chainmail lies here.

Item.Name: greaves black minotaur
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of black minotaur greaves
Item.LongDescription: Some black metal greaves lie here.

Item.Name: vambraces black
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of black minotaur vambraces
Item.LongDescription: Some black metal vambraces lie here.

Item.Name: rod weaponry
Item.LongDescription: A shiny metal rod lies here.

Item.Name: cloak pitch black
Item.LongDescription: A pile of black cloth lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to have pockets inside it.

Item.Name: neckguard neck guard black plate
Item.LongDescription: A black plate collar rests here.

Item.Name: spiked gauntlets
Item.LongDescription: A pair of spiked gauntlets lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: They look pretty damaging.

Item.Name: shield shadow
Item.LongDescription: A shadowy shield rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You look into the depths of the shield and shiver at the evil it contains.

Item.Name: nightbringer short sword shortsword
Item.LongDescription: A very evil looking shortsword lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Magic AntiGood AntiNeutral Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

ExtraDescription.Description: The runes "NiGHtBrINgeR" are scrawled along the blade.

Item.Name: visor helm golden
Item.LongDescription: A helm and visor made of pure gold rests here.

Item.Name: breast plate gilded gold
Item.LongDescription: A large golden breast plate lies here.

Item.Name: cape white billowing silk
Item.LongDescription: A pile of white silk lies here.

Item.Name: shield huge tower
Item.LongDescription: A huge shield lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A pure white shield with a gold cross emblazoned across it.

Item.Name: dawnbringer mace huge two-handed
Item.LongDescription: A huge mace lies here. It radiates an aura of power.

ExtraDescription.Description: The runes "DAwNbRIngER" are scrawled along the handle.

Item.Name: spectacles wire rimmed
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of wire rimmed spectacles
Item.LongDescription: A small pair of wire rimmed spectacles rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: They'll make you look smart.

Item.Name: ring banded
Item.LongDescription: A small ring made of gold and silver bands lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The ring has entwined bands of gold and silver.

Item.Name: globe minor
Item.LongDescription: A small globe rests here. It shimmers and radiates power.

ExtraDescription.Description: Shimmering colors move inside the globe.

Item.Name: staff gnarled magius
Item.LongDescription: A gnarled staff lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to be simply a gnarled old limb. It feels powerful though.

Item.Name: girdle pouches many
Item.LongDescription: A girdle lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to be full of tiny pockets.

Item.Name: robe heavy woolen
Item.LongDescription: A heavy pile of wool lies here.

Item.Name: brooch life ivory
Item.LongDescription: A small ivory brooch lies here.

Item.Name: manual arts healing book
Item.LongDescription: A small book lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It appears to be a book of anatomy and medicine.

Item.Name: mace huge mithril
Item.LongDescription: A huge mace made of mithril metal lies here.

Item.Name: symbol holy golden
Item.LongDescription: A small holy symbol on a golden chain lies here.

Item.Name: ring marble thick
Item.LongDescription: A thick ring made of marble

Item.Name: bracelet thick marble
Item.LongDescription: A thick bracelet made of marble lies here.

Item.Name: boots striding
Item.LongDescription: A lithe pair of leather boots have been left here.

ExtraDescription.Description: They look comfortable to walk in.

Item.Name: cloak icy white
Item.LongDescription: A cold pile of white cloth lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Smoke rises from it almost like it's made of dry ice.

Item.Name: staff ice
Item.LongDescription: A staff made of ice rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The runes "FrIgID" are inscribed in the icy staff.

Item.Name: ring carved wooden
Item.LongDescription: A wooden ring is on the floor.

Item.Name: horn life
Item.LongDescription: A severed minotaur horn lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The horn is capped at both ends with gold. Unreadable runes are scrawled on it.

Item.Name: belt life
Item.LongDescription: A strange belt lies here.

Item.Name: stone blood red
Item.LongDescription: A blood red stone lies here collecting dust.

ExtraDescription.Description: The stone pulses with your own heart beat.

Item.Name: crossbow huge
Item.LongDescription: A huge crossbow rests here.

Item.Name: pack leather small
Item.LongDescription: A small leather pack rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks pretty big on the inside.

Item.Name: hood black leather
Item.LongDescription: A hood made of black leather rests here.

Item.Name: sleeves black leather
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of black leather sleeves
Item.LongDescription: Some leather sleeves lie here.

Item.Name: pants black leather
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of black leather pants
Item.LongDescription: Some leather pants lie here.

ExtraDescription.Description: They look sneaky.

Item.Name: sword wicked short shortsword
Item.LongDescription: A wicked looking shortsword lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Magic Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison Unholy

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks just perfect for backstabbing.

Item.Name: globe major
Item.LongDescription: A large globe rests here, pulsing uneasily.

ExtraDescription.Description: Shimmering colors move inside the globe.

Item.Name: chain chainmail black suit
Item.ShortDescription: a suit of black minotaur chainmail
Item.LongDescription: A huge pile of black chainmail rests here.

Item.Name: buckler spiked
Item.LongDescription: A small spiked buckler rests here.

Item.Name: ring studded
Item.LongDescription: A small studded ring lies here.

Item.Name: helm horned
Item.LongDescription: A small horned helm rests here.

Item.Name: axe great
Item.LongDescription: An extremely huge axe is resting here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The runes "DeAtH" are scrawled along the blade.

Item.Name: plate ethereal suit
Item.LongDescription: A suit of shimmering plate rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You can almost see through it.

Item.Name: helm ethereal
Item.LongDescription: A shimmering helm rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You can almost see through it.

Item.Name: blade ethereal
Item.LongDescription: A shimmering blade lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: You can almost see through it.

Item.Name: branch willow
Item.LongDescription: A small willow branch lies here.

Item.Name: key keep
Item.LongDescription: A small key lies here.

Item.Name: key red
Item.LongDescription: A small red key lies here.

Item.Name: key black
Item.LongDescription: A small black key lies here.

Item.Name: key white
Item.LongDescription: A small white key lies here.

Item.Name: key brown
Item.LongDescription: A small brown key lies here.

Item.Name: key yellow
Item.LongDescription: A small yellow key lies here.

Item.Name: key maroon
Item.LongDescription: A small maroon key lies here.

Item.Name: key green
Item.LongDescription: A small green key lies here.

Item.Name: key grey
Item.LongDescription: A small grey key lies here.

Item.Name: key runed
Item.LongDescription: A small runed key lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The key looks like it was made for royalty.

Item.Name: boots fur lined
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of fur lined boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of boots are on the floor.

Item.Name: pelt yeti white
Item.ShortDescription: the white pelt of a yeti
Item.LongDescription: A white pelt lies here.

Item.Name: sword kopesh
Item.LongDescription: A sword with a curved blade lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sword looks like it would be grasped so that the blade extended along the forearm of the wielder.

Item.Name: vambraces steel
Item.LongDescription: A gleaming pair of vambraces lies here.

Item.Name: greaves steel
Item.LongDescription: A gleaming pair of greaves lie here.

Item.Name: axe battle battleaxe
Item.LongDescription: A dangerous looking battle axe rests here.

Item.Name: plate steel breast
Item.LongDescription: A breast plate of thick steel rests here.

Item.Name: helm steel
Item.LongDescription: A steel helm has been left here.

Item.Name: halberd huge two-handed
Item.LongDescription: A huge halberd has been left here.

Item.Name: visor blue steel helm
Item.ShortDescription: a blue steel helm and visor
Item.LongDescription: A helm and visor of blue steel rests here.

Item.Name: greaves blue steel
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of blue steel greaves
Item.LongDescription: Some greaves made of blue steel rest here.

Item.Name: vambraces blue steel
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of blue steel vambraces
Item.LongDescription: Some vambraces made of blue steel rest here.

Item.Name: sword two two-handed
Item.LongDescription: A large sword lies here.

Item.Name: visor helm steel red
Item.ShortDescription: a red steel helm and visor
Item.LongDescription: A helm and visor made of red steel rests here.

Item.Name: greaves red steel
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of red steel greaves
Item.LongDescription: Some greaves made of red steel rest here.

Item.Name: vambraces red steel
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of red steel vambraces
Item.LongDescription: Some vambraces made of red steel rest here.

Item.Name: glaive
Item.LongDescription: A very large glaive rests here.

Item.Name: visor helm crimson steel
Item.ShortDescription: a crimson steel helm and visor
Item.LongDescription: A helm and visor made of crimson steel rests here.

Item.Name: greaves crimson steel
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of crimson steel greaves
Item.LongDescription: Some greaves made of crimson steel rest here.

Item.Name: vambraces crimson steel
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of crimson steel vambraces
Item.LongDescription: Some vambraces made of crimson steel rest here.

Item.Name: star morning morningstar
Item.LongDescription: A huge morningstar rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It looks damaging.

Item.Name: spiked brass knuckles
Item.LongDescription: A set of spiked brass knuckles lies here.

ExtraDescription.Description: A band held in the hand that has spikes on the front side.

Item.Name: ring key multi colored multi-colored
Item.LongDescription: A ring of multi-colored keys rests here.

ExtraDescription.Description: It has several keys of different colors on it.

Item.Name: maul huge wooden
Item.LongDescription: A huge wooden maul rests here.

Item.Name: potion misty
Item.LongDescription: A small misty potion rests here.

Item.Name: pouch belt
Item.LongDescription: A belt pouch lies here.

Item.Name: spear ogre
Item.LongDescription: A crude spear rests here.

Item.Name: club ogre war
Item.LongDescription: A large, crude club rests here.

Item.Name: cloak bear skin bearskin
Item.LongDescription: A rough bearskin rests here.

Item.Name: ear ring earring feathered
Item.LongDescription: Some feathered earrings rest here.

Item.Name: gauntlets ogre power
Item.LongDescription: Some heavy gauntlets lie here.

ExtraDescription.Description: They look very "handy".

Item.Name: club massive
Item.LongDescription: A massive club lies here, discarded.

Item.Name: cape thick fur
Item.LongDescription: A thick pile of fur lies here.

Item.Name: tunic fur lined
Item.LongDescription: A fur lined tunic rests here.
